test.bonusstring: Activate, deactivate, or switch the mode of any device to which you have a direct neural interface connection.
Change the firing mode of a readied firearm with a linked smartgun system.
Drop one object held in your hand(s).
Drop to prone.
Eject the detachable magazine of a smartgun.
Make a few quick gestures. Targets unfamiliar with the gestures may roll {INT} v. {Threshold: 2} to understand them.

Attack multiple targets in a single action, splitting your dicepool. Must be combined with {Action: Fire Single-Shot}, {Action: Fire Semi-Auto}, {Action: Fire Burst Fire}, {Action: Fire Full-Auto Simple}, {Action: Fire Semi-Auto Burst}, {Action: Fire Long Burst}, {Action: Fire Full-Auto Complex}, {Action: Throw Weapon (Non-Grenade)}, {Action: Throw Weapon (Grenade)}, {Action: Melee Attack}, {Action: Reckless Spellcasting}, or {Action: Cast Spell}.
Inflicts Running movement modifiers, and can move up to Running Movement Rate for the rest of the combat turn.
Send or speak a short message.
Activate a focus you are carrying.
Call a spirit that has already been summoned and placed on standby.
Activate, deactivate, or change the mode of any device with a simple switch, virtual button, or command from a commlink or other control device.
Change the firing mode of a readied firearm that is either not a smartgun or does not have its system linked.
Issue a command to a single spirit or group of spirits under your control.
Free a spirit from under your control. The spirit is not immediately sent back, but instead is freed to do as it chooses.
On success, target must resist {Weapon: DV} + net hits damage with an armor modifier of {Weapon: AP}.
Fires 1 shot without recoil penalties. Can use {Action: Multiple Attacks} if using two weapons. On success, target must resist {Weapon: DV} + net hits damage with an armor modifier of {Weapon: AP}.
Fires 1 shot. Can only use {Action: Multiple Attacks} if using two weapons. On success, target must resist {Weapon: DV} + net hits damage with an armor modifier of {Weapon: AP}.
Fires 3 shots. Can use {Action: Multiple Attacks}. On success, target must resist {Weapon: DV} + net hits damage with an armor modifier of {Weapon: AP}.
Fires 6 shots. Can use {Action: Multiple Attacks}. On success, target must resist {Weapon: DV} + net hits damage with an armor modifier of {Weapon: AP}.
Insert a fresh detachable magazine into a readied firearm, but only if the previous magazine has been removed.
Loads a bow with an arrow.
Make a Perception test. At the GM's discretion, immediately obvious things do not need a test.
Pick up an object in reach or put it down (gently).

Weapon must be properly holstered. On success, the weapon is readied and immediately make a Simple Action attack. On fail, the weapon is readied. On glitch, the weapon is not readied and your action phase ends. On a critical glitch, bad things happen.
Weapon is readied for attacks. Weapons not in traditional holsters may require a Complex action at the GM's discretion. Small throwing weapons can be readied {{AGI} / 2} at a time per action.

test.dice: {MAG} + {Spell: Spellcasting} v. {Action: Direct, Physical Combat Spell Defense}
test.bonusstring: Cast a spell. After action, resist {{Spell: Drain} + 3} with a minimum of 2 DV.

test.dice: {MAG} + {Spell: Spellcasting} v. {Action: Direct, Mana Combat Spell Defense}
test.bonusstring: Cast a spell. After action, resist {{Spell: Drain} + 3} with a minimum of 2 DV.
Cast a spell. After action, resist {{Spell: Drain} + 3} with a minimum of 2 DV.
Cast a spell. After action, resist {{Spell: Drain} + 3} with a minimum of 2 DV.
Cast a spell. After action, resist {{Spell: Drain} + 3} with a minimum of 2 DV.

test.dice: {MAG} + {Spell: Spellcasting} v. {Action: Physical Illusion Spell Defense}
test.bonusstring: Cast a spell. After action, resist {{Spell: Drain} + 3} with a minimum of 2 DV.

test.dice: {MAG} + {Spell: Spellcasting} v. {Action: Mana Illusion Spell Defense}
test.bonusstring: Cast a spell. After action, resist {{Spell: Drain} + 3} with a minimum of 2 DV.

test.dice: {MAG} + {Spell: Spellcasting} v. {Action: Physical Manipulation Spell Defense}
test.bonusstring: Cast a spell. After action, resist {{Spell: Drain} + 3} with a minimum of 2 DV.

test.dice: {MAG} + {Spell: Spellcasting} v. {Action: Mental Manipulation Spell Defense}
test.bonusstring: Cast a spell. After action, resist {{Spell: Drain} + 3} with a minimum of 2 DV.
Cast a spell. After action, resist {{Spell: Drain} + 3} with a minimum of 2 DV.
Cast a spell. After action, resist {{Spell: Drain} + 3} with a minimum of 2 DV.
Cast a spell. After action, resist {{Spell: Drain} + 3} with a minimum of 2 DV.
Cast a spell. After action, resist {{Spell: Drain} + 3} with a minimum of 2 DV.
Cast a spell. After action, resist {{Spell: Drain} + 3} with a minimum of 2 DV.
Cast a spell. After action, resist {{Spell: Drain} + 3} with a minimum of 2 DV.
Cast a spell. After action, resist {{Spell: Drain} + 3} with a minimum of 2 DV.
Cast a spell. After action, resist {{Spell: Drain} + 3} with a minimum of 2 DV.
Remove a detachable magazine from a weapon.
Shift to or from Astral Perception.
Stand up from being prone. If wounded, must make {{BOD} + {WIL}} v. {Threshold: 2} test to succeed.

Add +1 dice or +1 Accuracy to your next attack test. If using a smartgun, apply both bonuses. If using Vision Magnification, apply its effects instead. Bonuses are cumulative for up to {{{WIL} / 2} + {Improvement Value: TakeAimCount}} times. All bonuses are lost if any other action is taken, including a Free action.
Move behind cover. Must not be surprised.
Throw a readied grenade. Can use {Action: Multiple Attacks} if multiple grenades are readied.

Throw a readied weapon that is not a grenade. Can use {Action: Multiple Attacks} if multiple weapons are readied. On success, target must resist {Weapon: DV} + net hits damage with an armor modifier of {Weapon: AP}.
Use a simple device, like those activated by a simple movement, e.g. a thumb trigger, pressing a single key, or tapping a single icon.
If capable of Astral Projection, shift consciousness to the Astral Plane.
On success, reduce target spirit's services by net hits. After action, take drain equal to twice the spirit's total hits with a minimum of 2 DV.

test.dice: {MAG} + {Spell: Spellcasting} v. {Action: Direct, Physical Combat Spell Defense}
test.bonusstring: Cast a spell. After action, resist {Spell: Drain} with a minimum of 2 DV.

test.dice: {MAG} + {Spell: Spellcasting} v. {Action: Direct, Mana Combat Spell Defense}
test.bonusstring: Cast a spell. After action, resist {Spell: Drain} with a minimum of 2 DV.
Cast a spell. After action, resist {{Spell: Drain} with a minimum of 2 DV.
Cast a spell. After action, resist {Spell: Drain} with a minimum of 2 DV.
Cast a spell. After action, resist {Spell: Drain} with a minimum of 2 DV.

test.dice: {MAG} + {Spell: Spellcasting} v. {Action: Physical Illusion Spell Defense}
test.bonusstring: Cast a spell. After action, resist {Spell: Drain} with a minimum of 2 DV.

test.dice: {MAG} + {Spell: Spellcasting} v. {Action: Mana Illusion Spell Defense}
test.bonusstring: Cast a spell. After action, resist {Spell: Drain} with a minimum of 2 DV.

test.dice: {MAG} + {Spell: Spellcasting} v. {Action: Physical Manipulation Spell Defense}
test.bonusstring: Cast a spell. After action, resist {Spell: Drain} with a minimum of 2 DV.

test.dice: {MAG} + {Spell: Spellcasting} v. {Action: Mental Manipulation Spell Defense}
test.bonusstring: Cast a spell. After action, resist {Spell: Drain} with a minimum of 2 DV.
Cast a spell. After action, resist {Spell: Drain} with a minimum of 2 DV.
Cast a spell. After action, resist {Spell: Drain} with a minimum of 2 DV.
Cast a spell. After action, resist {Spell: Drain} with a minimum of 2 DV.
Cast a spell. After action, resist {Spell: Drain} with a minimum of 2 DV.
Cast a spell. After action, resist {Spell: Drain} with a minimum of 2 DV.
Cast a spell. After action, resist {Spell: Drain} with a minimum of 2 DV.
Cast a spell. After action, resist {Spell: Drain} with a minimum of 2 DV.
Cast a spell. After action, resist {Spell: Drain} with a minimum of 2 DV.
Fires 3 shots. Can use {Action: Multiple Attacks}. On success, target must resist {Weapon: DV} + net hits damage with an armor modifier of {Weapon: AP}.
Fires 6 shots. Can use {Action: Multiple Attacks}. On success, target must resist {Weapon: DV} + net hits damage with an armor modifier of {Weapon: AP}.
Fires 10 shots. Can use {Action: Multiple Attacks}. On success, target must resist {Weapon: DV} + net hits damage with an armor modifier of {Weapon: AP}.

Fires 20 shots without recoil penalties. Select a 10m x 2m cross-section within weapon range to suppress. Suppression zone remains until the end of the combat turn unless the shooter moves or takes another action. On success, everyone in the zone must always resist {Weapon: DV} damage with an armor modifier of {Weapon: AP}, and they get a penalty to all actions equal to net hits.
Fires a vehicle-mounted weapon.
Either load and fire or fire and load a readied bow.
Reload a weapon that is belt-fed (belt), break-action (b), or muzzle loaded (ml), has a cylinder (cy), drum (d), or internal magazine (m), or uses a Speed Loader.
Jump into a vehicle with a rigger adaptation. Must have a Control Rig or equivalent.
Increase run speed by 2m/hit or 1m/hit depending on metatype.
On success, spirit is summoned with a number of services equal to net hits. After action, take drain equal to twice the spirit's total hits with a minimum of 2 DV.
Use a skill with the approrpiate dicepool and limit.
Drop prone where you are, usually to avoid {Action: Suppressive Fire}.
Intercept a target attempting to move past you within {1 + {Weapon: Reach}} meters and perform {Action: Melee Attack} against them.
On success, can move past one character per net hit; they cannot use {Action: Intercept} to stop you unless it is {Action: Shadow Block v. Evade}.
On success, break out of Subduing.
On success, if {STR} + net hits exceeds {Target: {Physical}}, target is grappled and subdued. Causes no damage.

action.name: Use Sensors (Detect or Active Targeting) v. Living Beings

test.bonusstring: On success, if this is an active targeting, apply net hits as negative dicepool modifier to target's {Action: Ranged Defense} and {Action: Melee Defense}.

action.name: Use Sensors (Detect or Active Targeting) v. Vehicles

test.bonusstring: On success, if this is an active targeting, apply net hits as negative dicepool modifier to target's {Action: Ranged Defense} and {Action: Melee Defense}.
Vehicle is considered under control for the remainder of the combat turn.
Attempt to make a vehicle action.
On success, vehicle rams target. Target cannot use {Action: Block} or {Action: Parry} against this action.
On success, gain mark on target. Every 2 net hits can be used to inflict 1 DV Matrix damage.
On success, gain two marks on target. Every 2 net hits can be used to inflict 1 DV Matrix damage.
On success, gain three marks on target. Every 2 net hits can be used to inflict 1 DV Matrix damage.
Requires Owner marks on target. Changes the Matrix sculpt of an Icon.
On success, you know your OS. OS from opposed hits added after this.

Requires 1 mark on target device. If there is no eligible test, it is {{INT} + {Electronic Warfare}} [{Icon: Sleaze}] v. {Target: {Action: INT Firewall Defense}}. On success, you perform a Free Action with the device.

Requires 2 marks on target device. If there is no eligible test, it is {{INT} + {Electronic Warfare}} [{Icon: Sleaze}] v. {Target: {Action: INT Firewall Defense}}. On success, you perform a Simple Action with the device.

Requires 3 marks on target device. If there is no eligible test, it is {{INT} + {Electronic Warfare}} [{Icon: Sleaze}] v. {Target: {Action: INT Firewall Defense}}. On success, you perform a Complex Action with the device.
Requires 1 mark on target file. On success, target file's protection is removed.
Requires 1 mark on target persona. On success, the specified running program is crashed on the target persona.
On success, target icon must resist {Icon: Attack} + net hits Matrix damage.
On success, target data bomb is disarmed. On fail, the data bomb detonates.

Requires 1 mark on target file. On success, you can edit the target file, though any data bombs on it will detonate. You cannot edit files that are protected. You may use this test to protect a file as well, in which case hits become the file's protection rating.
You enter or exit the target host. When you leave a host, you return to the grid from which you entered.
Requires 3 marks on target icon. On success, you remove one mark of a chosen persona from the target. You do not need marks on the owner of the mark that you remove.
Requires 3 marks on target icon. On success, you remove two marks of a chosen persona from the target. You do not need marks on the owner of the mark that you remove.
Requires 3 marks on target icon. On success, you remove three marks of a chosen persona from the target. You do not need marks on the owner of the mark that you remove.
On success, the target Resonance signature is removed.
Requires 3 marks on target device. On success, the device will shut down for good on its next reboot and require a Software test to replace.
You hop to the target grid. If you do not have access to the target grid through your lifestyle, you must gain 1 mark on it to perform this action.
On success, gain 1 mark on target icon. Every 2 net hits can be used as one net hit on a {Action: Matrix Perception} test.
On success, gain 2 marks on target icon. Every 2 net hits can be used as one net hit on a {Action: Matrix Perception} test.
On success, gain 3 marks on target icon. Every 2 net hits can be used as one net hit on a {Action: Matrix Perception} test.

test.dice: {INT} + {Electronic Warfare} v. {Action: INT Data Processing Defense}
test.bonusstring: On success, if the target persona does not have a mark on you, it is no longer spotting you.

Requires Owner marks on the target icon. Choose a number of marks between 1 and 3 and send an invitation to an invitee persona. The invitee persona may gain the chosen amount of marks on the target icon with a single Free Action. You may rescind the invitation before the invitee gains the marks, but not after.

Can only target your own persona. Defense test only applies if you are link-locked, and if you are link-locked by multiple personas, each one rolls a defense test. On success, your persona and its device are instantly rebooted, and if you are in VR, you suffer Dumpshock.
Requires Owner marks on the target device. On success, the device increases the ambient noise penalty of all devices within a 100m radius by net hits.

Requires 3 marks on the target device. Requires VR and a Control Rig or equivalent. Requires target device to have rigger adaptation and to not currently be jumped into by someone else. No test is needed if you have Owner marks on the target device or the target device's onwer has given you permission. On success, jump into target device.

On success, spot target icon and gain one piece of information about target icon per net hit (see SR5 235). Target only defends if it is running silent. No test is needed to spot icons of devices within 100m that are not running silent. This test can be used to determine if there are running silent icons nearby. If you do not know a specific feature of a running silent icon, you must randomly select a running silent icon in range to spot (remember, there are literally quadrillions of running silent icons on grids that are always in range).
On success, use net hits to find pieces of information on the Matrix (see SR5 241) and/or to speed up the amount of time it takes to complete the search.

Requires 3 marks on the target device. Requires target to not be link-locked. On success, target device immediately goes offline and will come back online at the end of the next combat turn. The exact delay can be chosen to be longer, but this can be overriden with physical access to the target. If target is running a persona, the persona's OS and marks are reset, and all marks others have on the persona are cleared; if the persona was in VR, they suffer dumpshock.

Send a text or audio message the length of a short sentence, an image, or a file to a target persona whose commcode you have. If you have a direct neural interface, you can send longer and more complicated messages (about a paragraph's worth), even in AR. You can also use this action to open a live ffed to one or more recipients using any digital devices you have.

Requires 1 mark on target file. On success, select a Data Bomb rating up to net hits, select a passcode for the Data Bomb, and select whether or not the Data Bomb deletes the file when it detonates. A file can only have one Data Bomb at a time, and if the target file already has a Data Bomb, it immediately detonates. The Data Bomb is triggered if someone attempts to read, edit, copy, protect, delete, or put a Data Bomb on the target file without using the already-in-place Data Bomb's passcode. When a Data Bomb detonates, the persona who detonated it must resist (Data Bomb Rating)D6 Matrix damage, and then the Data Bomb deletes itself. Data Bombs can be detected with Matrix Perception.

Requires 1 mark on target icon. On success, intercept all Matrix traffic sent to and from the target as long as you have a mark on the target. You can listen to, view, and/or read this data live and/or save it for later playback/viewing on a device.
Requires 1 mark on the persona of the owner of the target device or agent. On success, the target device or agent believes that a Matrix action command you sent to it is legitimately from its owner.

Requires that your persona not be link-locked. If you are in VR, you switch your persona to AR. If you are in AR, you switch your persona to VR. If you switch from VR to AR, you immediately lose the effect of any bonus initiative dice.

Requires 2 marks on the target device or persona. On success, obtain the precise physical location of the target device or the device that is running the target persona. The target's physical location is known for as long as you have at least 1 mark on the target.
On success, reduce target persona's Firewall by 1 until they reboot. If they are at 0 Firewall, target persona must resist 1 DV Matrix damage per net hit.

test.dice: 2 * {Icon: Rating} v. {Action: WIL Data Processing Defense}
test.bonusstring: On success, reduce target persona's Data Processing by 1 until they reboot. If they are at 0 Data Processing, target persona must resist 1 DV Matrix damage per net hit.
On success, link-lock target persona and they must resist {Icon: Attack} + net hits + 2 per mark Matrix DV and an equal amount of biofeedback damage.

On success, link-lock target persona and they must resist {Icon: Attack} + net hits + 2 per mark Matrix DV and an equal amount of biofeedback damage. Biofeedback damage taken this way can only be Stun damage.
On success, a running cyberprogram on the target persona crashes and cannot be run again until the target persona reboots.
On success, reduce target persona's Attack by 1 until they reboot. If they are at 0 Attack, target persona must resist 1 DV Matrix damage per net hit.
On success, target persona must resist {Icon: Attack} + net hits + 2 per mark Matrix DV.
On success, reduce target persona's Sleaze by 1 until they reboot. If they are at 0 Sleaze, target persona must resist 1 DV Matrix damage per net hit.
On success, the host spots the target persona.
On success, the host and all its IC gain a mark on the target persona.
On success, if the host has 3 marks on the target persona, the target persona is forced to reboot; if they are in VR, they suffer dumpshock.
On success, target persona must resist {Icon: Attack} + net hits + 2 per mark Matrix DV. The attack itself is laced with biofeedback.
On success, target persona is link-locked. If the target persona is already link-locked by the host, the host and all its IC gain a mark on the target persona.
On success, if the host has 2 on the target persona, the target persona's real-world location is discovered and usually reported to real-world authorities immediately.

Call a registered sprite that is waiting in the Resonance, who will appear at the start of the next combat turn. The action can also be used to send a sprite of yours back to the Resonance, releasing it from any tasks it still owes.
Command a sprite to do something for you, using up a task.
On success, a sprite is compiled with tasks equal to net hits. After action, resist fading equal to twice the sprite's total hits with a minimum of 2 DV.
On success, reduce the target sprite's tasks by 1 for each net hit. After action, resist fading equal to twice the sprite's total hits with a minimum of 2 DV.
On success, reduce the number of hits on the target complex form by 1 for each net hit. After action, resist {Target: {Spell: Drain}} with a minimum of 2 DV.
On success, target sprite is registered and its OS erase, and target sprite gains 1 extra task per net hit. After action, resist fading equal to twice the sprite's total hits with a minimum of 2 DV.
On success, complex form is threaded. After action, resist fading equal to {Spell: Drain} with a minimum of 2 DV.

action.name: Thread Complex Form (v. INT Data Processing)

test.bonusstring: On success, complex form is threaded. After action, resist fading equal to {Spell: Drain} with a minimum of 2 DV.
On success, complex form is threaded. After action, resist fading equal to {Spell: Drain} with a minimum of 2 DV.

action.name: Thread Complex Form (v. LOG Data Processing)

test.bonusstring: On success, complex form is threaded. After action, resist fading equal to {Spell: Drain} with a minimum of 2 DV.

On success, sprite power succeeds against target persona. Cookie file remains until its pre-programmed duration expires, after which it returns to its sprite if it is online, but otherwise disappears.
On success, sprite power succeeds against target device. The power consumes the sprite's complete attention while active.
On success, sprite power succeeds against target persona. The power remains until the sprite takes any Matrix damage.
On success, sprite power succeeds against target device and immedatiately causes it to suffer a glitch; if 4 or more net hits were obtained, this is upgraded to a critical glitch.
On success, add 1 noise reduction per net hit until the end of the combat turn.
On success, reduce the hits on the target spell by 1 for each net hit. After action, resist drain equal to {Target: {Spell: Drain}}, with a minimum of 2 DV.
On success, consult the appropraite table to see what information is revealed.
On success, pass through the barrier, and you may bring one magically-active entity with you per net hit.

test.dice: {AGI} + {Palming} v. {Max: {INT} or {AGI}} + {Max: {Perception} or {Palming}} + {If: {Target: {Gear: Concealability}} gte 0; Then: {2 * {Target: {Gear: Concealability}}}; Else: {{Target: {Gear: Concealability}} / 2}}

test.bonusstring: +1 DV. Fires 3 shots instead of 6.
+1 Reach. After action, -1 to all Defense tests until next action phase and cannot use Active Defense techniques until next action phase.
+2 DV. Fires 6 shots instead of 10.
On success, gain Superior Position and cannot move far away from target.
+1 DV. Fires 2 shots instead of 3.
On success, break out of Clinch.
Identical to {Action: Suppressive Fire} with a narrower AoE, but targets cannot use {Action: Drop Prone} or {Action: Hit the Dirt}.
Can only be performed once per Combat Turn.
Requires flechette ammo type. Identical to {Action: Enhanced Suppresion}, but also get modifiers per tables on RG 121.
+1 Reach. On fail, -1 to all Defense tests until next action phase.
After action, cannot use any Defensive Interrupt actions until next action phase.
Extra AP -2. On fail, -2 to next action (not Defense tests) and cannot use {Action: Parry} or {Action: Block} until next action phase. Requires Ready Weapon before next attack. Requires both hands.
+1 DV.
Moves opponent 1m/hit instead of dealing damage, up to maximum walking rate.
On success, can make {Action: Melee Attack} with a Simple Action for that action phase.
On success, can immediately make {Action: Melee Attack} against a nearby target. On fail, remain prone.
Wound penalties act as bonus instead of penalty for this action. Net hits become {Perception} threshold for target to avoid being caught unaware.
Wound penalties act as bonus instead of penalty for this action. Net hits become {Perception} threshold for target to avoid being caught unaware.
+2 DV. Requires Superior Position. After action, lose Superior Position.
On success, target pushed out of reach. Cannot be in Grapple or Clinch.
On success, target pushed out of reach. Cannot be in Grapple or Clinch.
On success, if {STR} + net hits exceeds {Target: {Physical}}, target can be pushed. On fail, fall prone. Must be running at target.
On success, if {{STR} + {BOD}} + net hits exceeds {Target: {Physical}}, fall prone, and target is pushed and falls prone. On fail, fall prone. Must be running at target.
On success, +3 dice to next {Action: Melee Attack} against target. On fail, -1 die to next {Action: Melee Attack} against target.
Require Clinch or Subduing against target. On success, if {STR} + net hits exceeds {Target: {Physical}}, target can be thrown. On fail, target escapes Clinch or Subduing.
Require Clinch or Subduing against target. On success, if {STR} + net hits exceeds {Target: {Physical}}, target can be thrown. On fail, target escapes Clinch or Subduing.
On success, avoid attack and target takes damage. On fail, take damage as normal.
Go prone behind any nearby cover within 4m.
Requires being in Clinch from target. On success, reverse positions in Clinch.
Requires being in Subduing from target. On success, reverse positions in Subduing.
On success, perform {Action: Throw Weapon (Grenade)} at -2 penalty to throw grenade back. Bad things happen if grenade triggers before throw.

action.name: Run for Your Life / Dive on the Grenade

test.bonusstring: Can immediately move away from grenade or indirect, combat, AoE spell.
Require Clinch or Subduing against target. On success, if {{STR} + {BOD}} + net hits exceeds {Target: {Physical}}, become prone and target can be thrown. On fail, take damage and become prone.
On success, avoid attack and target takes damage. On fail, take damage with +2 DV extra.
Move up to 2m and take damage from an attack intended at a target. Can only be used once per combat turn.
On success, negate hits on target's {Action: Dodge} by net hits.
On success, negate hits on target's {Action: Evade} by net hits.
